article_title: Sanders may have won 22% more votes than Hillary, but Hillary gets more delegates
article_text:
Politico reports the delegate count arising out of the New Hampshire vote.

Hey, Sanders kids, relax. The fix is in.

Among the 712 superdelegates, Hillary had a 45-to-1 margin a few months ago, in the 80% the Associated Press was able to reach to survey.

Hey, Sanders kids, relax. The fix is in.

Politico reports the delegate count arising out of the New Hampshire vote.

Among the 712 superdelegates, Hillary had a 45-to-1 margin a few months ago, in the 80% the Associated Press was able to reach to survey.

og.title: Blog: Sanders may have won 22% more votes than Hillary, but Hillary gets more delegates

article_summary:
Hey, Sanders kids, relax.
Among the 712 superdelegates, Hillary had a 45-to-1 margin a few months ago, in the 80% the Associated Press was able to reach to survey.
Politico reports the delegate count arising out of the New Hampshire vote.
The fix is in.
